SA17nagcitpu:2: NCit_1.1 brahmāṇaṃ ca mahādevaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ sarasvatīm /
SA17nagcitpu:3: varadāṃ ca mayā natvā kriyate jayamaṃgalam //
SA17nagcitpu:9: namo namo mayā samyag ucyate citralakṣaṇam //
SA17nagcitpu:10: NCit_1.4 ādau candramasaṃ vande haraṃ ca candraśekharaṃ /
SA17nagcitpu:11: viṣṇvindrau sūryamagniṃ ca varuṇaṃ marutaṃ tathā //
SA17nagcitpu:20: NCit_1.9 puredaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śrutvā nararājo mahodharaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:25: NCit_1.11 nīrogā na ca hantāro manorogavivarjitāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:29: NCit_1.13 varṇāśramā hi catvāro na cyutā dharmatatparāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:32: bhayajito manaḥ śuddhaṃ pravṛttaṃ tapasi drutam //
SA17nagcitpu:41: NCit_1.19 savidhe tvāgataḥ kaścid rudan vipro 'tiduḥkhitaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:42: kathaṃ rodiṣi bho vipra cetyapṛcchad dvijaṃ nṛpaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:43: NCit_1.20 kruddhena tena vipreṇa kathito nṛpatistadā /
SA17nagcitpu:45: NCit_1.21 tato 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ taṃ śāssīdaṃ nṛpa niścitam /
SA17nagcitpu:46: viṣmayo ya itaḥ pūrvaṃ na jāto 'sau pravartate //
SA17nagcitpu:49: NCit_1.23 bramha priyau hi rājan tvaṃ sarva jānāsi bhūtale /
SA17nagcitpu:50: prāṇatulyaṃ sutaṃ mahyaṃ dehi svāmin kṛpānvitaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:51: NCit_1.24 dayāṃ yadi na kuryāstvaṃ śaktiman guṇavan nṛpa /
SA17nagcitpu:53: NCit_1.25 bhāṣite tu dvijenaivaṃ buddhimān puraṣottamaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:54: ākarṣaṇe sutaṃ tasya matiṃ cakre nṛpālakaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:55: NCit_1.26 sāntvitastu nṛvākyena "āgaccha mama dāsa hi" /
SA17nagcitpu:61: NCit_1.29 prabho tribhuvanasyāpi dīyatāṃ tanayaḥ priyaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:62: viśvakarman dvijanmane asmai prītyā ca dhīmate //
SA17nagcitpu:63: NCit_1.30 śrutvā pretādhipo vākyaṃ pūjanīyaṃ hasan nṛpam /
SA17nagcitpu:64: dadau pratyuttaraṃ mṛdu tejasā pūritaṃ vacaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:65: NCit_1.31 svakīyakarmavaśād jīvāḥ sarve madvaśagā dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:67: NCit_1.32 sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ karmavaśaṃ sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:68: tasmāt rājan vijānīyān mayā naiva pragṛhyate //
SA17nagcitpu:69: NCit_1.33 madgṛhaṃ pratipadyātha śarīrī na nivartate /
SA17nagcitpu:72: karmānusāriṇī bhūmir vijñeyā ca sadā nṛṇām //
SA17nagcitpu:73: NCit_1.35 evamuktaḥ punarbhūpaḥ prāha vaivasvataṃ yamam /
SA17nagcitpu:75: NCit_1.36 na śakyate na śakyate yama āha punaḥ punaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:76: dehi dehi sutaṃ deva rājñāpi prārthitaḥ punaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:77: NCit_1.37 āgrahasyātiśayyaṃ ca tayoritthaṃ babhūva ha /
SA17nagcitpu:78: vyākulau tī mahāyuddhe tadā liptau babhūvatuḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:79: NCit_1.38 tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti ta rājā bahuśaḥ prāha vīrahā /
SA17nagcitpu:80: sthito 'smīti raṇe rājan tamavocad nṛpaṃ yamaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:81: NCit_1.39 asaṃkhyānāṃ ca vāṇānāṃ tīkṣṇānāṃ parivarṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:83: NCit_1.40 śrutaghnaṃ sarvato divyaṃ meghato vārivarṣavat /
SA17nagcitpu:91: NCit_1.44 tataḥ pretādhipo devo dṛṣṭvā taṃ tu parājitam /
SA17nagcitpu:95: NCit_1.46 sarve bhūtā bhayatrastā mahābhūto 'pi sarvataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:97: NCit_1.47 duḥkhitāṃ sakalāṃ pṛthvīṃ dṛsṭvā brahmā tathā suraiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:98: ājagāma svayaṃ tatra tasmin deśe raṇākule //
SA17nagcitpu:100: sāñjaliḥ pūjayitvā taṃ prāha yathāyathaṃ vacaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:103: pratyāvṛtya raṇād devaḥ kathayāmāsa tau tadā //
SA17nagcitpu:104: NCit_1.50 na doṣo bhavatāṃ nātha mṛtyupatermahātmanaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:106: NCit_1.51 purā śubhāśubhaṃ karma tathā ca śiśunā kṛtam /
SA17nagcitpu:107: labdhañca maraṇaṃ śīghra janma prāpya ca mānuṣam //
SA17nagcitpu:108: NCit_1.52 sāphalyameti te śramo brāhmaṇasyāsya pūjanāt /
SA17nagcitpu:119: NCit_1.57 brahmābravīt tato bhūpaṃ brāhmaṇaprītaye ime /
SA17nagcitpu:120: yamadutā jitāḥ śaktyā sādhu sādhu kṛtaṃ tvayā //
SA17nagcitpu:121: NCit_1.58 brahmāṇā kathite tvevaṃ sa rājā harṣamāptavām /
SA17nagcitpu:124: brahmā svayaṃ samāśvāsya bhūpatiṃ prāha sattamaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:125: NCit_1.60 dharmanītiḥ suvijñāya na nindet kāmapi prajām /
SA17nagcitpu:127: NCit_1.61 yatra sevā satāṃ nāsti tatra nindā bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:128: nālpamapi sukhaṃ kiñcid āpnoti nindukaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:129: NCit_1.62 dveṣiṇo 'pi budhāḥ svargād bhavanti vicyutāstahā /
SA17nagcitpu:131: NCit_1.63 nirahaṅkāriṇā tasmāt bhavitavyaṃ sadā khalu /
SA17nagcitpu:132: jātyā balena dānena naipuṇyena ca vidyayā //
SA17nagcitpu:135: NCit_1.65 avirodhena satkāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ sadā nṛpaiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:136: kṣamāvalambanīyā syāt nindā tyājyā tathaiva ca /
SA17nagcitpu:138: NCit_1.66 puruṣaṃ vacanaṃ tyājyam āghātaṃ visṛjet sadā /
SA17nagcitpu:139: pratyakṣaṃ prāpyate yattu sārthakyaṃ tasya cintayet //
SA17nagcitpu:140: NCit_1.67 devavipravirodhināṃ kutrāpi na sukhaṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:141: vidhiyaṃ naiva kāryaṃ hi yamasyāpi tato nṛpa //
SA17nagcitpu:142: NCit_1.68 brahmaṇetthaṃ sa bhūpālo hy upadiṣṭo dvijapriyaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:144: NCit_1.69 yamo 'pi prītimāpanno brahmā prasannatāṃ gataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:146: NCit_1.70 atha brahmā nṛpaṃ prāha nagnaṃ pretaṃ nivāraya /
SA17nagcitpu:147: yamadāsaiḥ sadā viśvaṃ na pātayed bhavān khalu //
SA17nagcitpu:148: NCit_1.71 balena tejasā cāpi tapasemaṃ guṇaṃ nṛpāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:150: NCit_1.72 bhavān mahāyaśasvī ca karaṇīyo mayā kṣitau /
SA17nagcitpu:152: NCit_1.74 pretaparyāyakaṃ nagnam ajaiṣīstvaṃ yato balāt /
SA17nagcitpu:157: NCit_1.76 asya brāhmaṇaputrasya citrasya lekhanena ca /
SA17nagcitpu:160: adya prabhṛti taccitra jagadvandyaṃ bhavet sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:161: NCit_1.78 pāpaghnaṃ ca manohāri protisukhapradaṃ nṛṇām /
SA17nagcitpu:163: NCit_1.79 tavādau lekhakakhyātiḥ mameyaṃ vacanena ca /
SA17nagcitpu:165: NCit_1.80 brahmaṇetthaṃ vacasyukte yamo vipraśca nagnajit /
SA17nagcitpu:166: sarve nemuśca bhaktyā taṃ brahmāṇaṃ lokapālakam //
SA17nagcitpu:167: NCit_1.81 sarveṣāṃ maṅgalaṃ kṛtvā trilokeśaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:169: NCit_1.82 rājātha dharmarājaṃ taṃ pūjayitvā prayantataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:171: NCit_1.83 athāsau brāhmaṇastuṣṭaḥ prapayau nagaraṃ drutam /
SA17nagcitpu:172: yasmād deśāt samāpannas tatraiva praviveśa ca //
SA17nagcitpu:173: NCit_1.84 hṛṣṭo rājā samitraśca citrasaṃracanāya vai /
SA17nagcitpu:175: NCit_1.85 sarvarūpānukūlaṃ tat mānaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:176: tat praṣṭuṃ sṛṣṭikattariṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma saḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:177: NCit_1.86 kṛpayā brūhi me brahman citrasaṃlekhanakramam /
SA17nagcitpu:178: citrasya lakṣaṇāni me nānāvidhāni santi ca //
SA17nagcitpu:179: NCit_1.87 parimāṇaṃ kimasya syāt vidhinā kīdṛśena vā /
SA17nagcitpu:181: NCit_1.88 brahmātha prāha bhūpendraṃ śṛṇu rājan samāhitaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:182: atiguhyaṃ mahad vākyaṃ paramaṃ kathayāmi te //
SA17nagcitpu:183: NCit_1.89 sṛṣṭerādau samāyātā vedā yajñāśca bhūpate /
SA17nagcitpu:184: tataḥ prajā mayā sṛṣṭā upadiṣṭāśca tā mayā //
SA17nagcitpu:185: NCit_1.90 caityānāṃ karaṇāyaiva citraṃ saṃlikhyate yataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:186: vedāccitraṃ prajātaṃ vai tasmād jñeyaṃ tathaiva tat //
SA17nagcitpu:190: NCit_1.92 girīṇāṃ sumeruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ aṇḍajānāṃ khagādhipaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:191: yathā nareṣu bhūpendras tathā citraṃ kalāsu vai //
SA17nagcitpu:192: NCit_1.93 patanti sāgare nadyaḥ samudrā ratnamāśritāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:195: NCit_1.94 himālayo yathā śreṣṭho nageṣu sakaleṣu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:198: tathā śreṣṭhaṃ bhaveccitraṃ sarvāsu hi kalāsu ca //
SA17nagcitpu:199: NCit_1.96 nagnajid gaccha tasmāt tvaṃ viśvakarma samīpataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:203: NCit_1.98 dṛṣṭo 'sau viśvakarmā ca rājñā namaskṛtastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:205: NCit_1.99 rājāha viśvakarman bho brahmajñayā hyupasthitaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:206: citrasya lakṣaṇaṃ karma upadiśatu me prabho //
SA17nagcitpu:207: NCit_1.100 vidhirvā parimāṇaṃ vā kīdṛśaṃ vā bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:210: citraśilpasya śāstraṃ tu tasmai rājñe hyupādiśat //
SA17nagcitpu:211: NCit_1.102 ekāgramanasā tattu śrūyatāṃ yad madbhāṣitaṃ /
SA17nagcitpu:217: NCit_1.105 kena mānena śobhanāḥ sthānopāyaiśca kīdṛśaiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:218: brahmaṇaḥ kṛpayā labdhāḥ sarve śilpā mayā kṛtāḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:221: NCit_1.107 jñeyaṃ mattastvathā rājan lakṣaṇamākṛti tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:223: NCit_1.108 citramīdṛśaṃ saṃlekhyaṃ yatnād buddhimatā tvayā /
SA17nagcitpu:228: likhitvā vividhaṃ samyak tubhyaṃ mayā pradaśryate //
SA17nagcitpu:229: // iti nagnajiccitralakṣaṇanirdeśe nagnajayo nāma prathamaḥ parivarttaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:231: NCit_2.1 yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam ācaṣṭe bhūpatiṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:233: NCit_2.2 sthāvare jaṃgame naṣṭe pralayānte ca vai purā /
SA17nagcitpu:234: prādurabhūt suvarṇāṇḍaṃ tamo hatvā jalāt kila //
SA17nagcitpu:239: NCit_2.5 sthānaṃ caryā ca dharmaśca nyāyaśca prābhavan tadā /
SA17nagcitpu:240: evaṃ kṛte sati brahmā-cintayat jagato hitam //
SA17nagcitpu:241: NCit_2.6 evaṃ cintayatastasya matiritthaṃ babhūva ha /
SA17nagcitpu:243: apramādena cādaraḥ sadā teṣu kathaṃ bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:244: NCit_2.7 brahmetthaṃ cintayitvā tu viṣṇoḥ śivasya cātmanaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:250: NCit_2.10 vilokya tāni citrāṇi netramūlāt pramoditāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:252: NCit_2.11 ime devāḥ prasannāśca svaptākāraṃ ca lebhire /
SA17nagcitpu:254: NCit_2.12 prāha saptasurān brahmā astu puṇyaṃ samāśritam /
SA17nagcitpu:255: adya prabhṛti sarvatra yuṣmākaṃ pratimāsu ca /
SA17nagcitpu:256: nātra śaṅkā kṛthā naraḥ pūjayiṣyati vaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:258: manuṣyeṣu ca yo nāma bhavantaṃ pūjayiṣyati /
SA17nagcitpu:260: NCit_2.14 nānā prakāraduḥsvapnāt dveṣagrastebhya eva ca /
SA17nagcitpu:261: sarveṣā rakṣaṇa kṛtvā pāpān nāśayati dhruvam //
SA17nagcitpu:262: NCit_2.15 dharmaśca sadṛśo bhāvyaḥ rakṣohānirbhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:266: NCit_2.17 pratimāṃ yāṃ pratidinaṃ puṇyātmā pūjayiṣyati /
SA17nagcitpu:267: tayaiva dīyate śāntis tasmai bhaktāya sarvataḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:268: NCit_2.18 evaṃ vavatviti prāhur devāḥ prasannamānasāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:271: NCit_2.19 parimāṇādikaṃ teṣāṃ mattaḥ śrutvā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:273: NCit_2.20 brahmaṇaśca mayā prāptaṃ vidyottamā ca lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:275: NCit_2.22 trilokeṣu ca pūjyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:277: NCit_2.23 ādyutpannañca doṣeṇa hīnaṃ nānāśrayaṃ param /
SA17nagcitpu:282: tat tathaiva pravakṣyāmi mānaṃ brūhi prajāsu ca //
SA17nagcitpu:285: NCit_3.3 ye bhavanti ca teṣāṃ vai bhūpatonāṃ tatastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:287: NCit_3.4 paramāṇuśca vālāgraṃ likṣā yūko yavo 'ṅguliḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:291: aṣṭalikṣā bhaved yūkaḥ aṣṭayūkā yavaḥ smṛtaḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:292: NCit_3.6 dvyaṅgulordvyaṅgulaṃ mānam aṅguliḥ syād yavāṣṭakam /
SA17nagcitpu:302: sākṣāt savarṇyate cātra purvoktaṃ vistareṇa ca //
SA17nagcitpu:304: tribhāgena vibhaktaṃ ca samānena tathā budhaiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:312: dvātriṃśat tasya maṇdalam aṅgulīnāṃ hi mānataḥ //
SA17nagcitpu:318: NCit_3.17 karṇasya luṭikāmānaṃ niścayena na kīrtyate /
SA17nagcitpu:321: narttane rodane krodhe cāpākārā bhavet sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:322: NCit_3.19 bhaye śoke ca bhrūprāntāv unnatau kramikau smṛtau /
SA17nagcitpu:326: NCit_3.21 bhrūvaḥ prabhṛti bhālāntaṃ mānaṃ syāccaturaṅgulam /
SA17nagcitpu:327: dvyaṅgulau hyakṣikoṣaḥ syān netramadhyaṃ tathaiva tu //
SA17nagcitpu:336: NCit_3.26 ucchrāyaśca tathāyāmo netrāṇāṃ varṇito mayā /
SA17nagcitpu:338: NCit_3.27 kāmināṃ ca tathā strīṇāṃ netraṃ matsyodaraṃ bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:360: NCit_3.37 oṣṭhāntau vimbavad raktau tathā cāpānukārakau /
SA17nagcitpu:365: NCit_3.39 adhādhaḥ kaṇṭhadeśaya cāyamaḥ syād daśāṅguliḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:369: NCit_3.41 pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /
SA17nagcitpu:373: NCit_3.43 trikoṇā kuṭilā vṛttā naiva kāryā mukhākṛtiḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:374: krodhayuk roṣayuk caiva na mukhaṃ syāt kadācana //
SA17nagcitpu:376: susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā //
SA17nagcitpu:377: NCit_3.45 śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /
SA17nagcitpu:380: tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam //
SA17nagcitpu:381: NCit_3.47 ata ūdhrvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kāyamāna vicārataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:383: NCit_3.48 yat sthānaṃ kaṭideśasya udarasya tathāntarā /
SA17nagcitpu:384: jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:385: daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam //
SA17nagcitpu:388: NCit_3.50 jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:390: nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam //
SA17nagcitpu:392: mānaṃ ca dahiṇāvarttaṃ yavaikaṃ cucukaṃ smṛtam //
SA17nagcitpu:393: NCit_3.52 maṇḍalo dvayaṅgulo vāsaḥ punardeyaṃ cucūkayoḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:396: NCit_3.53 āyāme dvyaṅgulaṃ meḍhraṃ vāsteyastu ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:399: NCit_3.54 medaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulaṃ proktam antaraṃ svodarānnanu /
SA17nagcitpu:403: NCit_3.56 prāntadvayaṃ ca jaṅghāyā vikhyātaṃ citrakarmaṇi /
SA17nagcitpu:406: NCit_3.57 ñyaṅgulaṃ jānubhāgasya āyāme na tathārohe /
SA17nagcitpu:410: mṛdu karikarākāraṃ na kāryaṃ viṣamaṃ kvacit //
SA17nagcitpu:413: NCit_3.60 ucchrāyeṇa tu pārṣṇīnāṃ mānaṃ pañcāṅgulaṃ matam /
SA17nagcitpu:426: NCit_3.66 agre samunnatā kāryā dīrghā aṅgulayastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:428: NCit_3.67 ekaikāṅgulito nyūnāḥ sarvāḥ syuḥ kramikāgatāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:430: NCit_3.68 aṅgulīnāṃ tu jālāśca sannaddhāḥ sundarāstathā /
SA17nagcitpu:436: NCit_3.71 aṅgulistu tribhāgaḥ syāt spaṣṭā vṛddhāṅgulistathā /
SA17nagcitpu:440: itthaṃ caraṇamānaṃ syān mayā proktaṃ sucintitam //
SA17nagcitpu:448: aṅguṣṭhe dve tu parvaṇī samenaika yavo bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:458: NCit_3.81 parvārdhena mitāḥ kāryā nakhāḥ sūkṣmāṃ nakhāgrakāḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:460: NCit_3.82 parvaṃ dīrghaṃ ca vṛtaṃ ca karatalasuśobhanam /
SA17nagcitpu:462: NCit_3.83 akuṭilamavakraṃ ca gambhīraṃ sūkṣmakaṃ tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:466: sukhadaṃ cāru susparśaṃ kuryāt karatalaṃ śubham //
SA17nagcitpu:467: NCit_3.85 samantān māṃsapūrṇaṃ vai nāṛī dṛśyā kadāpi na /
SA17nagcitpu:468: hastapṛṣṭhaṃ sadā snigdham unnataṃ ca bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:469: sūkṣmā aṅgulijālā hi sundaraṃ ca tanustathā //
SA17nagcitpu:472: NCit_3.87 ārohāyāmamānaṃ tu hastasya gaditaṃ mayā /
SA17nagcitpu:473: bāhūnāṃ mānamārohaṃ dhīman śṛṇu vadāni te //
SA17nagcitpu:474: NCit_3.88 ubhayostu tathā bāhvīr mānaṃ kuryād yathāvidhi /
SA17nagcitpu:483: NCit_3.92 hastau na jānuparyantau dīrdhau sūkṣrmau ca sundarau /
SA17nagcitpu:487: NCit_3.94 tasmād rājendra hastena jānuprāpta udīryate /
SA17nagcitpu:489: NCit_3.95 punaragre pravakṣyāmi lakṣaṇāni śubhāni vai /
SA17nagcitpu:490: yāni purvaṃ na coktāni tāni tubhyaṃ vadāmyaham //
SA17nagcitpu:494: NCit_3.97 ārohastasya madhyasya daśāṅgulaṃ bhaved dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:495: āyāme cāṅgulīnāṃ hī saṃkhyā yāyād navānvitā //
SA17nagcitpu:498: NCit_3.99 madhyasya dvayaṅgulāyāmaḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhāgena sundaram /
SA17nagcitpu:499: puruṣāṇāmidaṃ mānaṃ strīṇāṃ bhāgaḥ sa eva hi /
SA17nagcitpu:504: caturaṅgulaṃ sthānaṃ syāt pāyustu dvyuṅgulaṃ matam //
SA17nagcitpu:511: NCit_3.104 dantaśirasya lobhānāṃ vyavasthā kramaśo yathā /
SA17nagcitpu:512: varṇasya lakṣaṇaṃ caiva devamukhe na dīyate //
SA17nagcitpu:517: NCit_3.107 dantamūlaṃ tathā tālu jihvāsīmā ca lohitam /
SA17nagcitpu:519: NCit_3.108 śvadantānāṃ yavārdhena vṛddhiḥ kāryā vicārayan /
SA17nagcitpu:536: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam //
SA17nagcitpu:538: vakṣasthalaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ ca śobhitaṃ syāt sulakṣaṇam //
SA17nagcitpu:539: devabhūtamanuṣyāṇāṃ mukhe śmaśru na roma ca //
SA17nagcitpu:542: NCit_3.118 surāṇāṃ keśajālaṃ tu sūkṣmalateva saṃgatam /
SA17nagcitpu:550: NCit_3.122 gajavat sabalau pādau vṛṣavadānanaṃ kharam /
SA17nagcitpu:552: NCit_3.123 veśadṛśāṃ gatiṃ cātha atikramya ca sarveṣām /
SA17nagcitpu:558: samantāt kiraṇāvṛtaḥ rājā lekhyaḥ kṛśaḥ sadā //
SA17nagcitpu:561: NCit_3.127 mukhaṃ candradṛśaṃ śvetaṃ sugnigdhaścāparaḥ śaśī /
SA17nagcitpu:563: bhrūvoḥ kaṇṭhasya bhālasya saundaryaṃ hi mukhasya ca //
SA17nagcitpu:565: cārvoṣṭaṃ raktimāpūrṇaṃ svacchā dantā nabho yathā //
SA17nagcitpu:566: NCit_3.129 dīrdhottama ca pakṣma hi snigdhavarṇaṃ bhavettathā /
SA17nagcitpu:567: nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ca dīrghaṃ ca cakṣuḥ syāt sumanoharam /
SA17nagcitpu:573: NCit_3.132 māṃsapurṇaṃ bhaved vakṣaḥ tasyāroho yathākraman /
SA17nagcitpu:580: mukheṣu connatā jñeyā gulpho 'dṛśpo bhavet tathā //
SA17nagcitpu:589: NCit_3.139 tejasvī vīryavān rājan cakravarttī sadā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:591: NCit_3.140 dehe jaṅghopajaṅghā ca bhṛśaṃ vikaśitā bhavet /
SA17nagcitpu:592: suhastau caraṇau syātāṃ tathā parva ca dṛśyate //
SA17nagcitpu:593: NCit_3.141 kukṣipṛṣṭe suśobhite mukhaṃ cāru manoharam /
SA17nagcitpu:594: śobhitau ca bhujau syātāṃ deho mānānvito bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:598: NCit_3.143 prasiddhaiḥ śilpibhiḥ kāryaṃ mānavāṅgeṣu yatnataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:600: NCit_3.144 upayukteṣu sarveṣu parimāṇaṃ tu yatra ca /
SA17nagcitpu:601: tatra svāṅgulinā kāryaṃ mānaṃ sarvatra karmaṇi //
SA17nagcitpu:604: NCit_3.146 atī jñeyañca paṇḍitaiḥ parimāṇaṃ suyatnataḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:606: pratimā sā parityaktā suradevaiḥ sadā khalu //
SA17nagcitpu:607: NCit_3.147 piśācā rākṣasā bhūtā vasanti tvarita tathā /
SA17nagcitpu:608: śobhitān nāśayanti ca amaṅgalaṃ bhayaṃ bhavet //
SA17nagcitpu:609: NCit_3.148 ārohāyāmayoḥ rājan lakṣaṇaṃ kathitaṃ mayā /
SA17nagcitpu:611: NCit_3.149 valiḥ sūryo dāśarathiḥ rāmo manusutastathā /
SA17nagcitpu:615: NCit_3.151 apriyo na yathā yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vicārayet /
SA17nagcitpu:617: NCit_3.152 caturṇāṃ ca tathā rājñāṃ parimāṇasya lakṣaṇam /
SA17nagcitpu:618: brahmaṇā tu pradarśitaṃ vistaraṃ bravīmi te //
SA17nagcitpu:619: NCit_3.153 sarvasya lekhane granthe vistāro bhavati dhruvam /
SA17nagcitpu:624: tubhyaṃ pradarśayāmi ced gacched grantho viśālatām //
SA17nagcitpu:628: NCit_3.157 ato buddhayā suniścitya bhadro lekhyo vicārayan /
SA17nagcitpu:634: NCit_3.160 ato 'nyomānaniyamo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
SA17nagcitpu:637: NCit_3.161 ucchrāyo navarat strīṇā jñeya ekāṅguliḥ kṛśaḥ /
SA17nagcitpu:641: āroho nāpriyo yāyāt tathā mānaṃ vidhīyatām //
SA17nagcitpu:644: nārīṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ śṛṇu krameṇa hi //
SA17nagcitpu:645: NCit_3.164 rājñāṃ yathā pradarśitaṃ mānena ca tathāyutam /
